todos.details: Watching Bleach with 2 of my friends: Prad, Manu, and Anom while discussing the latest anime arcs.
Buy vegetables, fruits, and snacks for the weekend.
Leg day session including squats, lunges, and calf raises.
Discuss the new website design and assign tasks to team members.
Finish reading the latest chapter of One Piece and start Demon Slayer.
Have dinner with parents and siblings, catch up on recent events.
